questions.question: Are your products 100% organic?
questions.answer: Yes! All our products are made with 100% organic ingredients, free from harmful chemicals, preservatives, and artificial flavoring.

questions.question: Do you add sugar or sweeteners?
questions.answer: No, we never add artificial sugar or sweeteners. Our products are naturally sweetened with organic fruits and honey.

questions.question: Is delivery available across Netherlands?
questions.answer: Yes, we deliver our products nationwide with fast and eco-friendly packaging.

questions.question: How should I store Mom's Natural Foods products?
questions.answer: We recommend storing them in a cool, dry place. Products without preservatives stay fresh naturally if kept properly.

questions.question: Are your products safe for kids?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Since our foods are made with natural and chemical-free ingredients, they are completely safe and healthy for children.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: From a home kitchen to your table - a journey of passion, health, and natural goodness

story.title: The Beginning of Our Journey
paragraphs: The story of the granolas that I used to make at home turning eventually into a brand name goes back to the fall of 2011. Back then in a place out of paradise in Bordubet, Marmaris I remember attending my dear friend Hale's detox program which had really changed so many things in my life.
Hale had recently come from the United States and the granola that I learned about after my numerous conversations with her became a must-have food in our household.

What was this thing called granola? In short, granola is made by oven-baking oatmeal with nuts and dried fruits along with a natural sweetener such as honey until it gets crunchy. It came about as a healthy food in the United States in the 1960's with the hippie movement.

Although it moved away later on from being a healthy food option with such additives as refined sugar and soy and similar products in it, it has always attracted my attention since I have always been passionate about healthy, natural eating.

evolution.title: From Home Kitchen to Your Home
paragraphs: What started as a personal passion for healthy eating quickly grew into something more. Friends and family who tasted our homemade granola encouraged us to share this goodness with others.

We decided to stay true to the original healthy principles of granola - using only natural ingredients, avoiding refined sugars, and preserving the nutritional value through careful preparation methods.
Today, Mom's Natural Foods continues this tradition, bringing you the same love and care we put into those first batches from our home kitchen, now available for your family to enjoy.

modal.footer: This is what makes Mom's Natural Foods special

Made with Love.details: Every batch of our products is prepared with the same love and care we would give to our own family. This means paying attention to every detail, from ingredient selection to final packaging.
benefits: Handcrafted in small batches for quality control
Made with genuine care and attention
Made with Love.commitment: We believe that food made with love tastes better and nourishes both body and soul. This philosophy is at the heart of everything we create.

100% Natural.details: We source only the purest ingredients directly from nature. No artificial additives, preservatives, or chemicals ever touch our products.
100% Natural.commitment: We are committed to maintaining the natural integrity of every ingredient, ensuring you get the full nutritional benefits nature intended.

Quality Guaranteed.details: Our rigorous quality control process ensures that every product meets our high standards before it reaches your home.
Quality Guaranteed.commitment: We stand behind every product we make. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll make it right.

Family Focused.details: We create products that families can feel good about serving to their loved ones, focusing on nutrition, safety, and taste.
Family Focused.commitment: We're not just a business - we're a family serving families, committed to helping you make healthy choices easy.

Our Mission.details: To make healthy, natural eating accessible and enjoyable for everyone, without compromising on taste or quality.
Our Mission.commitment: We're dedicated to breaking down barriers to healthy eating and making natural foods a joyful part of everyday life.

Excellence.details: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our business, from product development to customer service.
Excellence.commitment: We're never satisfied with 'good enough' and are always looking for ways to improve and serve you better.

questions.question: Can I visit your facility?

login.title: Mom's Natural Foods
login.subtitle: Premium natural foods made with love and care
login.secure: Secure admin access to Mom's Natural Foods
login.introduction: Mom's Natural Foods ("Company", "we", "our", or "us") operates the Mom's Natural Foods mobile and web application (the "App"). We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in compliance with applicable laws in Turkey, including the Law on the Protection of Personal Data (KVKK).
login.dataCollect: We only collect the following personal data from our users:
login.dataNoMore: We do not collect, track, or store any additional information such as location, payment details, or browsing activity.
login.purpose: The data collected is used solely for user authentication, account access, and secure login to our services.
login.storage: Your personal data is securely stored on Hostinger servers located in Germany. We ensure that all data is encrypted and protected against unauthorized access or disclosure.
login.sharing: We do not share, sell, or transfer your data to any other party, organization, or external domain. All data remains within our secure system hosted in Germany.
login.deletion: Users may request the deletion of their account and associated data at any time by contacting us at info@site_url.nl. Upon verification, all personal data will be permanently removed from our servers.
